title: I am really bad at this game :'(
body:
seriously whats wrong with my play style.

I have correct runes and masteries and play very well in normal and against  beginner bots. I dont over extend I even start with a killing spree but then get snow balled

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Intoxication,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=XfrWNQZc,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-05-15T13:28:02.841+0000)
>
> seriously whats wrong with my play style.
> 
> I have correct runes and masteries and play very well in normal and against  beginner bots. I dont over extend I even start with a killing spree but then get snow balled

http://www.lol-coaching.com/coach.php?id=45223

Check out my profile, if you like what you see you can arrange a time for me to play with you and improve your gameplay!
Cheers,
Aezuros

playing well against bots doesnt mean a thing, don't put any value into that.

The ONE thing i would say to you is farm better. Your farm is so ridiculously low in almost every game.

You probably average 2cs per minute, when the aim is to try and average 10cs per min.

You should play more normals instead of bots and customs to get better.
You can practice farming in custom games though, if you wanna improve. Alone in a custom game, no bots, try to get 100cs by 10 mins or as close as you can.

-------------------------------------------------------------

other things:

"correct runes" - in what world are mana regen seals "correct" ?

Your builds overall are ok, a couple questionable choices but its fine. Hydra on Vi? ok....

Not one game, even when you play support, do you ever get a sweeper or upgrade your trinket

I do not like almost every one of your mastery pages. You should look up a guide for better masteries.

http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Intoxication
